p: Antimicrobial activity of essential oil (EO) of Cyprus Citrus aurantium L. flowers was analyzed, and the recorded minimum inhibitory concentrations (MIC) against Amoxycillin-resistant Bacillus cereus was 1.562 mg/mL [ 36]. Moreover, the extracts of Psidium sp., Mangifera sp., and Mentha sp. and its mixtures displayed antimicrobial effects and strongly reduced Streptococcus mutans [ 37].
